DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study demonstrate relative efficacy two lumbar fusion procedure : transacral lumbar interbody fusion use conjunction unilateral bilateral posterior pedicle screw fixation adjunct fusion , comparison transforaminal lumbar interbody fusion ( TLIF ) use conjunction unilateral bilateral supplemental screw fixation adjunct fusion . Subject candidate previously require receive fusion L4-L5-S1 lumbar level treat pseudoarthrosis , spinal stenosis , spondylolisthesis , degenerative disc disease ( DDD ) .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Comparing Fusion Rates Two Lumbar Fusion Procedures
DOC.detailed_description: Consecutive subject treat transsacral lumbar interbody fusion TLIF procedures least 2 year prior date data collect evaluate .
DOC.criteria: Adult 18 year age old Male female subject previously receive transsacral twolevel procedure use conjunction pedicle screw facet screw fixation TLIF twolevel procedure unilateral bilateral supplemental screw fixation ( e.g . pedicle screw , facet screw L4L5S1 treat pseudoarthrosis , spinal stenosis , spondylolisthesis , degenerative disc disease ( DDD ) Subject treat less 2 year prior evaluation transsacral TLIF procedure participate surgeon Subject diagnosis require transsacral TLIF procedure L4L5S1 level require treatment lumbar level time surgery Subject receive transsacral TLIF procedure fusion L4L5S1 Subject receive lumbar fusion procedure level L4L5S1 time surgery
